summary: 'All Things Must Pass' is a documentary that explores the rise and fall of Tower Records, and its legacy forged by its rebellious founder, Russ Solomon.
cast: Chuck D|Chris Cornell|Heidi Cotler|Rudy Danzinger|Bob Delanoy|Mike Farrace|David Geffen|Stan Goman|Dave Grohl|Chris Hopson|Elton John|Steve Knopper|Steve Nikkel|Questlove|Ken Sockolov|Russ Solomon|Bruce Springsteen|Jim Urie|Mark Viducich
title: El auge y hundimiento de Tower Records
